Customers describe it as comfortable, stretchy, and sexy, with one mentioning it's perfect for Halloween. items.author: Nicolette Halvorson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars See Through!!
items.body: When reading the comments from women that had previously ordered this dress I figured being 5'6" and 140lbs I was safe to order a small. I will say that it fits me pretty well, but the sleeves are pretty darn tight. I also realized that I will not be able to go braless as you can see EVERYTHING. I have a tattoo on my thigh and it's quite large and you can see every detail of it.. I've decided that I may still wear it, but im going to have to steal some cups out of my bathing suit to make it work, plus nude panties. Other than that, it it very stretchy and form fitting, make the girls look great, if you aren't super well endowed (I'm a 34B-ish, slightly larger depending on brand of bra). I hope this review is helpful! The reviews before said that the dress was thick, and I will say it'll keep you warm but allow everyone to see underneath if you get the white dress.. yikes! Im ordered it for my bachelorette so im not too worried haha. Read more
items.author: Lacey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: Very comfortable and flattering. Im a very small (if anything) cup size and it still looked great. The fabric material is soft and stretchy, but also elastic enough to hold to your body nice without constructing. Read more
items.author: Carri

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didnâ€™t fit

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy!
items.body: Love this dress! Good price and it fit perfect. You can move it sting to show more or less stomach, I had it really low to show more. It's really stretchy so it hugs your body really good. I'm very curvy but I was still able to order the small. I'm 5'2" and 34DDD with a curvy booty. This dress delivered Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love this dress

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Winered, White, Royal Blue, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
